constraints.name: rectangular_union
constraints.description: 两个矩形合并后的结果必须仍然是一个矩形
constraints.formal: ∀ (R1, R2) ∈ Rectangles, R1 ∪ R2 is a rectangle

constraints.name: non_intersecting_rectangles
constraints.description: 初始的矩形区域不相交，但可以相切
constraints.formal: ∀ (R1, R2) ∈ InitialRectangles, R1 ∩ R2 = ∅ or R1 and R2 touch

constraints.name: subset_constraint
constraints.description: 每个城堡必须完全包含在某个初始国家的矩形区域内
constraints.formal: ∀ C ∈ Castles, ∃ R ∈ InitialRectangles, C ⊆ R
